News Releases, Media Advisories

 

For Immediate Release:                                  Contact:  Kelly Huff
February 26, 1998                                                 Ron Harris
                                                                  Sharon Snyder
                                                                  Ian Stirton

FEC ANNOUNCES NEW PHONE NUMBERS

WASHINGTON-The Federal Election Commission has completed the installation of a new telephone system and after close of business Friday, February 27, all phone numbers at the Commission except one will be changed.

The only Commission phone number to remain the same will be the toll-free number, 800-424-9530.

New phone numbers include:

Press Office (202) 694 - 1220

Public Records (202) 694 - 1120

Information (202) 694 - 1100

# # #
title: FEC Announces New Phone Numbers
